test_Description:
1.Open browser and navigate to URL :
"https://lcaas.techmahindra.com/cobol
2. Enter the value 'admin' in the field.
3. Enter the value 'admin1' in the field.
4. Click on 'Login'.
5. Click on 'CICS Screen Report'.
6. Click on 'Screen Definition'.
7. Click on 'All'.
8. Click on 'ADPG005'.
9. Click on 'Submit'.
10. Click on 'ACCOUNTS PAYABLE'.
11. Click on 'Submit'.
12. Click on 'Log Out'.
